Package events

Class BlockChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • events.BlockChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventObject
    public class BlockChangeEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventObject
    The event thrown when a block has been changed in the domain.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    group17

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockChangeEvent

        public BlockChangeEvent​(java.lang.String changedBlockId,
                        java.lang.String topOfMovedChainId,
                        java.lang.String changedLinkedBlockId,
                        ConnectionType changedConnection,
                        java.lang.String beforeMoveBlockId,
                        ConnectionType beforeMoveConnection,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> changedBlocks)
        Create the BlockChangeEvent
        Parameters:
        changedBlockId - The ID of the block that has been changed.
        topOfMovedChainId - The ID of the block on the top of the chain
        changedLinkedBlockId - The new connected block ID
        changedConnection - The new connection
        beforeMoveBlockId - The ID of the block to which the changedBlock was connected before the move, "" if the block was not connected to any other block.
        beforeMoveConnection - The connection of the block before the move, NOCONNECTION if there was no connection before the move.
        changedBlocks - A set with the id's of all the changed blocks.

    • Method Detail

        a set containing the id's of all the changed blocks

        public java.lang.String getChangedLinkedBlockId()
        Retrieve the ID of the changed linked block
        Returns:
        The ID of the new linked block.

      • getConnectionType

        public ConnectionType getConnectionType()
        Retrieve the changed connection.

      • getBeforeMoveBlockId

        public java.lang.String getBeforeMoveBlockId()
        Retrieve the previous connected block ID. If no blockId was previously connected returns an empty string.
        Returns:
        the previous connected block ID. If no blockId was previously connected returns an empty string.

      • getBeforeMoveConnection

        public ConnectionType getBeforeMoveConnection()
        Retrieve the previous connectionType. If no previous connection exists, NOCONNECTION will be returned.
        Returns:
        the previous connectionType. If no previous connection exists, NOCONNECTION will be returned.

      • getTopOfMovedChainId
